import React,{useState} from 'react' import'./signup.css' import loginimg from '../components/static/loginimg.jpeg' function SIGNUP() { const [values,setvalues]=useState( { name:"", email:"", password:"", error:"", sucess:false } ) const handlechange=name=>event=>{ setvalues({...values,error:false,[name]:event.target.value}) } return (

SIGNUP

{JSON.stringify(values)}
) } export default SIGNUP
